import { Grid } from '@looker/components'

import storyBasic from '!!raw-loader!./Basic'
import storyColumns1 from '!!raw-loader!./Columns1'
import storyColumns4 from '!!raw-loader!./Columns4'

<Meta component={Grid} title="Docs/Grid" />

# Grid

`<Grid />` provides a simple implementation of the CSS Grid.

## Default

By default `Grid` has two columns with a "medium" `gap` between grid cells and "100%" `width`

<Editor code={storyBasic} />

## Columns

Use the `columns` prop to specify the number of columns to display.

<Editor code={storyColumns4} />

<Editor code={storyColumns1} />

## Gap

Specify `gap` to change the distance between grid cells (defaults to `medium`)

<Editor code={storyGapNone} />

<Editor code={storyGapU15} />

## Props

<ArgsTable of={Grid} exclude={excludedProps} />
